SEARCH
Package com.app.repository.impl

Class AnswerRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.repository.impl.generic.impl.AbstractCrudRepository<Answer,Long>
com.app.repository.impl.AnswerRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnswerRepository, CrudRepository<Answer,Long>
@Repository public class AnswerRepositoryImpl extends AbstractCrudRepository<Answer,Long> implements AnswerRepository
Implementation of the AnswerRepository interface using JDBI for database operations. Extends the AbstractCrudRepository to provide CRUD functionalities for Answer entities.
